name: Squid Warriors
description:
A Local Multiplayer game made for Nordic Game Jam 2016

4 controllers are needed

Players play as divers in two teams of two. A match lasts four rounds and in each round one of the players will become a squid, which is leaking ink. As long as the squid is on your team, you collect ink (points). If the other team catches your squid or you collected 100 points, the round ends and a player on the other team will become the squid.

Protect the squid from the opponent team, collect points over time and see who wins in the end.
